text: Everyone has to address [Name] as Master 👑
[Name] is the impolite one! Keep your elbows on the table until told otherwise! 🧏‍♂️💪
YOU SHALL NOT...TOUCH THE TABLE. Or take a 2 sip penalty ✋🚫🍷
[Name] is now forbidden to pronounce any vowel until further notice! 🙊🚫🅰️🅴️🅸️🅾️🙉
[Name] has to speak in a funny accent until told otherwise 😂🗣️
Whenever [Name] speaks, everyone else has to do a silly dance 💃🕺
[Name] can only communicate through hand gestures until further notice 👐🙅‍♂️
Every time [Name] speaks, everyone else has to take a sip 🗣️🍷
[Name] has to wear a funny hat for the rest of the game 🎩😄
[Name] has to sing every sentence until told otherwise 🎤🎶
Whenever [Name] speaks, everyone else has to say 'meow' instead of responding 😺🗣️
[Name] has to talk like a robot until further notice 🤖🗣️
[Name] has to speak in a British accent until told otherwise 🇬🇧🗣️
From now on, everytime a player says a curse word, they must apologise to the room drink 3 times. Have some f*cking manners! 🤬🙏🍷
[Name], hold [Name2]'s hand with love, until told otherwise! 🤝❤️
[Name] is the team captain! You can put your hand on the table whenever you want, the last player to put their hand on the pile has to drink 2 times 👋🏻🍺
[Name], you're the magician! Swap player drinks anytime, they'll deal with it 🎩🃏🍻
New rule everyone! Speak like Yoda you shall, otherwise drink 3 times you will 🗣️👴🏻🍺
[Name] chooses a person who will give them a hand massage! We'll say when to stop 💆‍♂️😌
[Name] is now the leader and everyone must follow their commands until further notice 👑🗣️
Whenever [Name] speaks, everyone else must speak in a whisper until told otherwise 🤫🗣️
[Name] must speak in rhyme for the rest of the game 🎶🗣️
[Name] is the truth or dare master! 😈 They choose someone to answer a revealing question truthfully or take on a daring challenge. Refusing or failing means drinking twice! 🍻
Whenever [Name] speaks, everyone else must speak in a different language until told otherwise 🗣️🈵
[Name] is to only communicate through charades until further notice 🎭🗣️
Whenever [Name] speaks, everyone else must imitate an animal sound until told otherwise 🦁🐵🗣️
[Name] is the designated mime. All communication must be done through mime until further notice 🤡🗣️
Whenever [Name] speaks, everyone else must speak in a different accent until told otherwise 🗣️🌍
[Name] must talk like a pirate until further notice 🏴‍☠️🗣️
Whenever [Name] speaks, everyone else must speak in a different voice (high, low, robot, etc.) until told otherwise 😄
[Name], you must drink every time the person to your right does. 🍻
[Name] and [Name2], the group will call you two by nicknames from now on. Get creative with them! 😎
[Name] is now the designated DJ. Everyone must dance to their music until told otherwise. 💃🕺
[Name] must use only one syllable words until told otherwise. 🗣️
[Name] must complete every sentence with the word 'banana'. 🍌
[Name] must wear a blindfold for the rest of the game. 🙈
[Name] must ask [Name2] permission to do anything, even the smallest things, until told otherwise. 🙋‍♂️
[Name] must speak in the third person for the rest of the game. 👤
[Name] must make a funny face every time they speak (Although their face is already funny looking). 😜
[Name] must give [Name2] a compliment every time they speak. 🥰
[Name] must do a dare from another player every time they move from their spot. 🤪
[Name] must only drink with their left hand (or right hand, if they're already left-handed). 🤚
[Name] must only drink from the person to their left's cup. 🍹
[Name] and [Name2] must immediately swap seats any time anyone mentions either of their names. 🪑
[Name] must only speak in questions from now on. ❓
[Name] must only use words that start with the letter 'A' from now on. 🅰️
[Name] must only use words that are related to food from now on. 🍔🍕🍟
[Name] must only use words that are related to animals from now on. 🐱🐶🦁
[Name] must only use words that are related to the color blue from now on. 🔵
Everyone has to speak like a caveman from now, meaning they can only speak 3 words max at a time (e.g. I like virus. Virus is funny.). 🦴
